beginner/intermediate laines du nord fairy floss in color 1003 isager soft in color e4 s materials 6 5 mm 24 inch circ tapestry needle ◆ main color 2 skeins isager soft color e4s worsted weight #4 100g/273yds ◆ contrasting color 1 skein juniper moon fairy floss color 1003 pixie super bulky weight #6 100g/328yds ◆ us 10 5/ 6 5mm circular knitting needles 24 inch ◆ stitch marker ◆ tapestry needle ◆ scissors ◆ crochet hook for provisional cast on *you will need a 2nd circular needle when working the kitchener stitch stitch key gauge co cast on bobble bind off blocked k knit p purl us 10 5/ 6 5mm sl3wyb slip 3 purlwise with yarn in back knitting needles sm stitch marker worked in pattern mc main color 12 sts by 28 row cc contrasting color = 4 inches/10cm 2 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern cozy by the fire cowl is worked in the round creating a tube which is then twisted and grafted together using kitchener stitch to give you a seamless join you can either choose to twist your cowl before grafting as written or keep it flat see note at the end if you prefer not using the provisional cast on method you can try using your favorite cast on method try using a horizontal invisible seam to stitch the ends together with this option you will want to bobble your stitches see last page for joining methods pattern provisional cast on with either mc or scrap yarn 72 sts be careful not to twist your stitches place your sm and join in the round note mc and cc are used every 2 rounds carry the colors with your work r1-2 with mc k all sts r3 with cc sl3wyb k3 repeat around r4 with cc sl3wyb p3 repeat around r5-12 repeat rounds 1-4 r13-14 with mc k all sts r15 with cc k3 sl3wyb repeat around r16 with cc p3 sl3wyb repeat around r17-24 repeat rounds 13-16 repeat rounds 1-24 8 more times total of 9 repeats you will have a total of 216 row notes if you used a regular cast on method now is the time to bobble your stitches don t want the twist in your cowl you may want to shorten the amount of repeats and work to your desired length 3 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern to join your cowl choose the cast on method you used below provisional cast on join 1 with your 2nd set of circular needles put your 72 provisional cast on stitches onto them 2 lay your cowl lengthwise in front of you to put the twist you will take the short end on your right holding the other end keeping it flat and rotate the right hand side flipping it over you
